Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black: [A.Brouwer pinx't  J.. Williams sculp't /THE JOVIAL COMPANY/ Engraved from the Original Picture in the Collection of Sir Joshua Reynolds];on sheet in pencil: [1-188]; on verso in pencil: [Scarce]
